meanings.sent1: She is unrounding the dough to make square cookies.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter is unrounding the edges of the table to give it a more angular look.
meanings.sent3: The unrounding of the ball made it bounce in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent4: His unrounding of the story added a sharp twist to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The unrounding process revealed the true shape hidden beneath the smooth surface.

meanings.definition: The act of changing a rounded shape to a less rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: The unrounding of the sculpture gave it a unique appearance.
meanings.sent2: The unrounding of the tire caused it to lose its circular form.
meanings.sent3: The unrounding of the balloon made it look like a misshapen animal.
meanings.sent4: The unrounding of the moon in the painting symbolized imperfection.
meanings.sent5: The unrounding of the vase revealed intricate patterns hidden beneath the smooth surface.
